title: [Bug]: Notification Counter disappears after about 3 or 4 seconds
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not sure

### Describe the bug

I am using Ubuntu 24.04 and have installed Dash-to-panel.  Your Teams for Linux Icon is pinned to the pannel. When I get a new teams message - the numeric counter shows a "1" for about 3 or 4 seconds.  Then the number disappears.  If I have the notifications are visible when the Teams message come in - the message is there for about 2-3 seconds - then disappears.  Seems to me like there is some kind of "auto-message-acknoledge" going on.  Any suggestions ?

Was using a slightly older version that I installed using the directions from this site a while back.  Using "apt-cache policy teams-for-linux" the version was 1.12.7.  I checked the Ubuntu store - and 1.13.1 was available via .deb.  So I uninstalled 1.12.7 and installed 1.13.1 from the store. 

apt-cache policy teams-for-linux
teams-for-linux:
  Installed: (none)
  Candidate: 1.13.1
  Version table:
     1.13.1 500
        500 https://repo.teamsforlinux.de/debian stable/main amd64 Packages
     1.12.7 -1
        100 /var/lib/dpkg/status

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1154c3f3-e1cf-42f9-9727-b04d993dd849)

Still have same issue.  When a new chat message come in it is visible in the Notificaitons for 3-4 seconds and Tams icon shows a "1".  But after 3-4 seconds the notificaiton is  cleared and number on icon disappears.

### What package are you using?

deb from Ubuntu store - version 1.13.1

Was using a slightly older version that I installed using the directions from this site a while back.  Using "apt-cache policy teams-for-linux" the version was 1.12.7.  I checked the Ubuntu store - and 1.13.1 was available via .deb.  So I uninstalled 1.12.7 and installed 1.13.1 from the store.  


### Reproduction steps

1.  Have someone send you a chat message in Teams
2.  New chat message come in it is visible in the Notifications for 3-4 seconds and Teams icon shows a "1". 
3.  After about 3 or 4 seconds the Notification disappears and the "1" on the icon disappears at the same time.
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
